Name: Verdict
About the game: Roleplay Focus This game has a critical focus on roleplay & collaborative writing. If you aren't a fan of serious writing, it probably won't be for you! Write out a story collaboratively with dozens of other players in a living, breathing world. Every action you make influences the course of history, shaping your character's life for the better or the worse. Fight, craft, explore & more in this generational, writing-focused MMORPG. Primary features While Verdict hinges on writing with other players, the game itself serves as an avenue to accentuate your stories with detailed, spell-based combat, in-depth crafting, hidden techniques and more. Time passes, and with it, your character(s) age. It's up to you to keep up and maintain your legacy for as long as possible. Make use of 10-20 spells at a time from our roster of 200+, each with unique stat scaling and effects that make every character's skillset feel unique. Harvest resources like gems, ore, and herbs and use them to make weapons/armor/amulets/etc. that stand the test of time. Detail your story by leveling any of our six skill trees, establishing your character as more than just a fighter: a cook, blacksmith, farmer, jeweler, or more! Play for your own goals, but be prepared for anything. Other players & characters might go against your plans, or the world itself might defy expectation. Spend your levels how you like. Your points are yours to use, meaning you can invest fully in Fire, or split half/half between Witchcraft and Druidry, or anything imaginable.
